name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
fullDescription: These wireless Bluetooth headphones deliver exceptional audio quality and deep bass. With up to 30 hours of battery life, they're ideal for travel, work, and play.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Fitness tracker with heart rate and sleep monitor.
fullDescription: Track your daily activity, monitor sleep patterns, and receive call/text notifications with this stylish and waterproof fitness watch.

name: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
description: Smart TV with built-in apps and voice control.
fullDescription: Enjoy ultra-crisp visuals with this 55-inch 4K smart TV. Comes preloaded with Netflix, YouTube, and more. Supports screen mirroring and voice assistant.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Mesh back office chair with lumbar support.
fullDescription: Stay productive and pain-free with this ergonomic chair featuring adjustable armrests, breathable mesh, and built-in lumbar support.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description: Backlit mechanical keyboard with blue switches.
fullDescription: Take your gaming to the next level with this mechanical keyboard. Features anti-ghosting keys, customizable RGB lighting, and satisfying tactile feedback.

name: Portable Projector
description: Mini projector for home or outdoor use.
fullDescription: Turn any wall into a cinema screen with this portable projector. Features HDMI/USB inputs, built-in speaker, and up to 120-inch display.

name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
shortDescription: Crystal clear sound on the go
description: Compact earbuds with ANC and touch controls.
fullDescription: Enjoy immersive sound with these wireless earbuds. Active noise cancellation, Bluetooth 5.0, and up to 8 hours playtime on a single charge.

name: Smart LED Light Strip
description: LED light strip controlled via phone or voice.
fullDescription: Create ambiance with these colorful LED strips. Compatible with Alexa and Google Home. Features music sync, timer, and millions of color options.

name: Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: 10-piece durable cookware set with glass lids.
fullDescription: This high-quality stainless steel cookware set includes pots and pans with heat-resistant handles and tempered glass lids. Oven and dishwasher safe.

name: Electric Toothbrush
fullDescription: Improve your oral hygiene with this electric toothbrush. Includes a 2-minute smart timer, pressure sensor, and 3 brush modes.

name: Smartphone Tripod Stand
fullDescription: Capture stable videos and photos with this flexible tripod. Features adjustable legs, Bluetooth remote, and universal phone mount.

name: Laptop Backpack with USB
fullDescription: This anti-theft backpack features multiple compartments, a USB charging port, padded laptop sleeve, and ergonomic design.

name: Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
fullDescription: Clean up your indoor air with this HEPA air purifier. Filters out dust, pollen, smoke, and pet dander. Ideal for bedrooms and offices.

name: Electric Standing Desk
description: Motorized desk for sitting or standing.
fullDescription: This standing desk helps improve posture and productivity. Smooth motorized height adjustment with memory presets.

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Smart robot with mapping and auto-charge.
fullDescription: Let this robot vacuum do the work. Features smart room mapping, scheduled cleaning, and auto return-to-dock charging.
